product_name: Sony Sony Action Cam Surfboard Mount
long_description: Use the Sony Action Cam surfboard mount to capture riveting footage of your surfing, stand-up paddleboarding and kayaking adventures with your Sony wearable camcorder (sold separately). Strong and flexible adhesive base provides secure attachment to the deck of your board or kayak. The Sony Action Cam surfboard mount comes with a tethered base and leash to help prevent accidental drops into the water.
short_description: Use the Sony Action Cam surfboard mount to capture riveting footage of your surfing, stand-up paddleboarding and kayaking adventures with your Sony wearable camcorder (sold separately).
